title: I Donated To The Impact Challenge But Don't Know How To Claim My Icon

embed.description: Next week, Omaze will be raffling off one of the gaming chairs used on-stage by League pros during this year's Worlds. A pristine gaming throne, on which tears were shed, hairs were pulled, and sweat was ... absorbed, will be given away to one lucky player who contributes to the Impact Challenge by October 31.

body: Can anyone help me figure this out?

replies.body:
You should receive an email from Omaze with instructions on how to redeem the Icon. 

If you have any further issues with this, I recommend reaching out to [Omaze](https://support.omaze.com/hc/en-us) directly.
